backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining storage, user, post, pond, tag, and activity state maps with associated types and access control initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure containing no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including components, pages, and layout behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions for building and deploying the app to the Internet Computer using DFX and Node tooling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the root React application and sets favicon and metadata.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Automation script that generates backend bindings, builds the frontend, and deploys canisters with status output and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, global layout, and Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component with customizable colors using the bookmarks hook.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: UI component rendering a comment with avatar, username, timestamp, content, likes, and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar allowing users to react with predefined emojis and displaying reaction counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution section including a styled heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main app header with search, navigation, avatar fetching, and responsive mobile/desktop behavior. Manages dropdowns, modals, and search execution with debounced input.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with header, footer, routed content, and a mobile left-sidebar drawer. Automatically closes the drawer on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the left navigation sidebar with active route highlighting and recent activity items. Fetches ponds, activities, and related data for sidebar links.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays an individual lily post with avatar, metadata, stats, like/share actions, and optional tag visibility. Fetches dynamic counts and handles like interactions.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Shows a lily image with automatic aspect-ratio detection and blurred-backdrop fallback for non‑4:3 images. Supports click handling and lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide‑in mobile sidebar drawer with scroll locking and overlay scrim. Hosts the LeftSidebar component inside a mobile drawer layout.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond info including stats, moderators, visibility, and join/leave actions. Fetches pond metadata and handles membership changes with toasts.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Provides a join button for pond cards with disabled state when already joined. Executes join actions and shows success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile header for a pond with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation. Handles routing between feed and about tabs.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting controls, metadata, content preview, optional image, tag badge, and comment/view counts. Supports upvote/downvote callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Shows a user ribbit on their profile with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, content, and link to conversation. Fetches avatar and associated lily data.
Provides a popover emoji picker that triggers a callback when an emoji is selected. Uses preset emojis and simple button UI.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit with avatar, content, like button, reply form, and indentation based on depth. Manages liking and creating replies via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar image with a blurred placeholder and fade-in transition, supporting avatar or plain img modes. Handles preload success and error gracefully.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts using data-fetch hooks with skeleton loading states. Computes rankings with memoized lists.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal with trending terms, suggestions, and input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under the search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags using reusable modules with icons and loading states. Fetches tag stats via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger, adding underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmark IDs with localStorage persistence and utilities to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login and clear methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches using the browser's matchMedia API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, posts, profiles, and other backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom OKLCH theme variables, light/dark modes, and utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog terms and a large English word list used for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates, loads, resizes, and compresses images client‑side with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric pond‑name validation, normalization, and error messages.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by metrics and returns deterministic rank assignments.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copying with toasts.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, and Froggy Phrase generation and storage via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per‑lily view cooldown timestamps in localStorage to limit view increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines using static content.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with rankings, join controls, and loading states, allowing navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating lilies with support for text, image, and link types, tag suggestions, image compression, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with name validation, description and phrase fields, and image upload with compression and preview.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Allows users to create posts of various types, handle image uploads with compression, and submit posts to selected ponds.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile with avatar, post/comment counts, and tabs for posts and comments, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home feed with sorting, search handling, and sidebars, showing lily cards or skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with ribbits, likes, views, and interactions, including view-count tracking and ribbit creation.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, and join/leave actions, with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond's feed of lilies with sorting, banners, sidebars, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a full post with metadata, image/link content, and threaded comments, and allows submitting new comments with sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows the user's locally bookmarked lilies, loading each bookmark and allowing removal if unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats in a tabbed layout, with sidebars and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and subcategory listings.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides username management, avatar upload, profile editing, pond membership controls, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and pending feature requests focused on removing AccessControl checks for normal users and ensuring phrase-hash users and pond creators have seamless access. Includes architectural notes and known authorization issues.
